title: New: Bully – Milkman / Faceblind
content:
Having now sold out two prints of their self-titled debut EP, and proving to be one of the must see artists at SXSW, Nashville’s Bully are well and truly on the rise.

They’ve just made their new 7″ available to pre-order, featuring two new tracks, Milkman and Faceblind, with the A-side showing off their raw, beautifully unrefined edge. On the flip-side, Faceblind appears more composed, yet equally as exciting. On the strength of these two tracks, and their debut EP, Bully are one of the most impressive new bands in the world right now.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
